channel.title: No global object?
channel.description:
When i got to search for global object nothing comes up and i searched it in client.java and i dont have a world object file. i even searched global but nothing about adding one...but i have a objects.cfg would i add objects in that? Looks like: [code] //Face: -3 = south | -2 = east | -1 = north | 0 = west //Type: 1 = Y + 1 | 2 = X + 1 | 3 = Y - 1 | 4 = X - 1 //-------objID--objX----objY----height--face----type----open? object = 1536 3215 3225 0 -2 1 false Lumbridge Castle object = 1536 3215 3211 0 -2 1 false Lumbridge Castle object = 1530 3208 3211 0 -2 1 false Lumbridge Castle [/code] Etc. someone plz help
BUT i have this in my client.java file [code]AddGlobalObj[/code]

item.title: No global object?
item.dc:creator: @redfrodude27 redfrodude27
item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

When i got to search for global object nothing comes up and i searched it in client.java and i dont have a world object file. i even searched global but nothing about adding oneâ€¦but i have a objects.cfg would i add objects in that?
Looks like:

//Face: -3 = south | -2 = east | -1 = north | 0 = west
//Type: 1 = Y + 1 | 2 = X + 1 | 3 = Y - 1 | 4 = X - 1
//-------objID--objX----objY----height--face----type----open?
object = 1536	3215	3225	0	-2	1	false		Lumbridge Castle
object = 1536	3215	3211	0	-2	1	false		Lumbridge Castle
object = 1530	3208	3211	0	-2	1	false		Lumbridge Castle

Etc.
someone plz help

BUT i have this in my client.java file

AddGlobalObj
